channel.title: Sébastien Moog. Senior UX Designer
channel.description: Recent content on Sébastien Moog. Senior UX Designer

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, I’m Sébastien! Designer for more than a decade, I bring an engineering perspective and creative problem- solving approach to create products that people can easily use. Download my resume What my colleagues say "Our collaboration unlocked the storytelling power of UX and helped steer the focus away from patchwork-like short term fixes by putting the user needs in the very center." — Tibor K, Staff Product Designer "Working with Sébastien on design driven topics is always a pleasure and shows how valuable it is to work in a collaborative way on an application – being able to adjust, fix & deliver components of high quality.
